issue.title: [Packaging] Wheel builds are failing due to wheel 0.32 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3369](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3369). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Recent update of multibuild: https://github.com/matthew-brett/multibuild/commit/f6128176d90792ba572921c447325130666cb950
Causes build error: https://travis-ci.org/kszucs/crossbow/builds/435068100

comments.body:
